title: By his Excellency the Lord General and the Council of State. Whereas information is given that several persons disaffected to the peace of this Common-Wealth, upon occasion of the present change of government, do assemble together in a riotous and tumultuous manner ...
author: England and Wales. Council of State.
publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert, Thomas Brewster, and by and for Henry Hills,
notes: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Order to print dated: Wednesday June 29. 1653. Signed: John Thurloe Secr.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
